name: TheSoulKeeper
description:
Currently on itch.io and Steam.

Main Character

The story follows a young orphan named Rhody who decides to go through a mysterious book, which makes his pet disappear. Our protagonist embarks on an adventure full of drawbacks to find his partner again.


What is the videogame about?

TheSoulKeeper is an adventure video game aimed at ages 7 to 21. You can't miss the pleasure of playing it having these features:

  • Rodhi possesses a stick to attack enemies.
  • There are enemy rats that will chase you all over the map to headbutt you and finish you off.
  • There are also enemy skeletons that through magic will set traps on your legs.
  • Places where you will have to put all your concentration in different jumps.
  • The different locations will have various enemies and respawn points.
  • Do puzzles to follow your path.

Team

Ainhoa Fernández / 3D Modeller, 3D Texturizer and Sound.

Raúl López / 3D Modeller and 3D Texturizer.

Iker Martínez / Game Designer and Programmer.

Javier Santana / 3D Modeler, Web Designer and Programmer.

Nerea Segovia / Concept Artist, 3D Modeller, 3D Texturizer.

Eva Segovia / Concept Artist, 3D Modeler and 3D Texturizer.
